title: boots
description: Heavy work boots caked in mud and grass.
look closer: There are small traces of red flower petals in the treads

title: safe
description: A black safe beneath the bed
look closer: It takes a 4 digit combination with numbers of 0-99

title: blanket
description: A ratty, blue blanket folded without care at the foot of the bed
look closer: It's knit with wobbly lines, someone handmade this.

title: wallet
description: An old, worn wallet with a license and multiple coupons.
look closer: The license belongs to Daniel Scott and all of his coupons are expired

title: journal
description: A pocket-sized journal with a grocery list, some reminders, and a schedule
look closer:
The schedule is a dog-eared page that reads:
 August 28th 
 4:00 PM - Head to town and get gas
 5:30 PM - Pick up firewood from Tom for tonight
 7:00 PM - Come home and fix generator

title: suitcase
description: Someone's purple suitcase: half-packed and full of women's clothing
look closer: It looks like the owner was unpacking instead of getting ready to leave

title: keychain
description: A carabiner with some keychains, a car key, and an ID card
look closer: The ID is a student card for Amelia Evans at BYU

title: groceries
description: Paper bags full of groceries
look closer: Most of the products inside are organic or excessively healthy

title: calendar
description: A calendar with most of the dates crossed out.
look closer: A.E. had a birthday on the 2nd and a work trip is scheduled from the 26th-30th

title: rug
description: A green shag carpet that has been crumpbled up and is stained with blood.
look closer: The blood is still somewhat fresh.

title: watch
description: A silver watch with a cracked face
look closer: The hands are stuck at 6:04

title: birthday photo
description: A framed photo of two young boys wrestling to blow out the candles on a poorly decorated cake
look closer:
The back of the photo reads:
Happy 8th Birthday, Theo!
March 14th.

title: shoebox
description: An old shoebox stuffed under the bed
look closer: Multiple date souveneirs and photos of Theodore and a woman. A few are labeled as 'T.S. + A.E.'

title: guest book
description:
A leather bound book with a pen attacthed by a string. The front reads 'Welcome, guests!'
Various people filled in their names and dates of arrival and departure
look closer:
Most recently, Theodore, Daniel, and Jamie arrived on August 10th while Amelia did on the 28th.
The only person who has left so far was Jamie on the 25th.

title: couch
description: An overstuffed brown sofa with enough room to sit three or four people
look closer:
Beneathy a few lumpy cushions is a bundled up trashbag with a kitchen knife inside.
Weird.

title: fireplace
description: A brick fireplace with trinkets displayed on its dusty mantle.
look closer: The firepit is empty with no firewood or ash inside.

title: family pictures
description: Some family photos and kitchy decorations line the walls.
look closer:
One sticks out, and shows a family of four huddled together.
Of the two teenage boys present, you recognize one as Theodore.
The plaque reads 'Scott family vacation!'

title: knife block
description: A cheap knife block.
look closer: There are ten slots, but only nine knives

title: vegetables
description: Diced vegetables on a plastic cutting board.
look closer: The onions are only half cut up, but you can't find a knife nearby.

title: pot
description: A pot on the stove full of spaghetti that boiled over.
look closer: According a box nearby, the pasta is all natural and non-GMO.

title: trashcan
description: A plastic garbage can.
look closer: It's mostly empty besides a few pamphlets on couple's counseling.

title: boxes
description: Piles of old storage boxes that are somehow free of dust unlike everything else.
look closer:
Hidden behind them you find a bloody tire iron.
Weird.

title: footprints
description: Muddy footprints line the stairs and some of the floor.
look closer: The steps seem to be from a large pair of boots

title: sink
description: A double-vanity with the cupboard door hanging off.
look closer:
Inside the cabinet is a myriad of cleaning supplies.
Strangely, that includes an empty box of trashbags.

title: mirror
description: It's dirty and covered in fingerprints from being pulled open.
look closer: The shelves inside overflow with women's makeup products.

title: magazine
description: A young adult magazine.
look closer: Most of the articles are tips for breakups or advice for first dates.

title: front seat
description: Faded leather seats that have seen better days
look closer:
Underneath the driver's seat you find a folder overflowing with legal papers.
Most of them detail the terms of Theodore's life insurance policy, which notes his brother as the beneficiary.

title: back seat
description: A row of seats covered in trashbags
look closer:
Black trashbags line the backseat and floor of the car.
The rest are thrown over an oddly shaped lump.
Oh, that's a person.
It looks like you found Theodore.

title: cupholder
description: A set of two cupholder's full of change and a few receipts.
look closer: A crumpled receipt at the bottom shows that something was bought from Greg's Glorious Groceries at 6:15 PM on August 28th.

title: trunk
description: Mostly empty besides a few shopping bags and a flat tire kit.
look closer:
The kit should include a jack, a pressure gauge, a user manual, a spare tire, and a tire iron.
You can see that everything is in place except for a missing tire iron.

title: crowbar
description: A heavy crowbar in the bed of your truck.
look closer: It's a bit old, but still perfectly usable.

title: car keys
description: A key fob for a car.
look closer: It looks plain and unassuming.
